metadata.title: CVE-2021-47020 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soundwire: stream: fix memory leak in stream config error path When streamconfig is failed, master runtime will release all slave runtime in theslave_rt_list, but slave runtime is not added to the list at this time.This patch frees slave runtime in the config error path to fix the memoryleak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
